house_listing.house_location: 305 Jeffrey Dr., Cedar Creek Cedar Creek, TEXAS
house_listing.house_description: Located in the subdivision of Heritage Oaks off Hwy. 21, this home is nestled among the pines. This home has lots of extra touches to it: a deck in the back, flagstone wlaks, country kitchen, and a storage shed. This home has been very well maintained. The price is just right for a first time home buyer, or rental. $88,500File: E0011.

highlights.item: Very well kept home at a low price.
